article_title: Yeshiva University President to Leave Post
article_text:
Yeshiva University’s president said on Thursday that he will leave his post when his contract ends, or sooner, amid fiscal woes at the century-old Jewish institution.

Richard Joel, 65 years old, has been president of the Manhattan-based school for nearly 12 years. His contract ends in 2018, but he will leave before that if the board finds a...
